title: Record of the Missing Sect Master - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Martial Arts   Mystery   Wuxia   Yaoi
tags: Amnesia   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Famous Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hated Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Lovers Reunited   Loyal Subordinates   Mind Control   Mysterious Past   Mystery Solving   Older Love Interests   Past Plays a Big Role   Poisons   Power Couple   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secret Identity   Shameless Protagonist   Sharp-tongued Characters   Smart Couple   Strategist   Strong Love Interests   Tragic Past   Transplanted Memories
author: Uma Vida de Roupas Bonitas   一世华裳
description:
A major event happened recently to the demonic sect – their powerful sect master suddenly went missing.

Everyone comforted each other: “Don’t worry, the sect master must be out pursuing fun, and so on.”

“Well, that makes sense.”

They waited.

Waited and waited.

Waited and waited.

Waited and… Everyone slammed the table: “We’ve waited so long! The sect master must have met with a mishap! Look for him!!” Numerous disciples therefore ran rumbling down the mountain.

On a certain day of the month, a certain sect master opened his eyes and thought in confusion: Hey, who am I?>
